text:
But disappointment awaited him. A restive queue of people in the bus station, waiting to be transported to Dinas. And when he went to Morfydd's house, all he found was Morfydd's mam, working herself up proper... Getting dark, now. The conductor switched on the lights. The beleaguered passengers peered out of the windows. Little to be seen, only a few lone stars, and the distant earth brooding in her shroud of mist.
